jean_luc_brunel_evasion.finding: Jean-Luc Brunel was 'hiding out in the mansion of Epstein while claiming he's unavailable for deposition'
jean_luc_brunel_evasion.role: Very much involved in trafficking the girls
jean_luc_brunel_evasion.pattern: Same evasion pattern as Maxwell and Dershowitz

epstein_legal_team_details.source: Perversion of Justice - Virgin Islands Daily News

attorneys.name: Kenneth Starr
attorneys.role: Lead defense attorney, Republican icon from Whitewater/Clinton investigation

attorneys.name: Jay Lefkowitz
attorneys.role: Kirkland & Ellis partner, Bush domestic policy adviser, later North Korea envoy

attorneys.name: Bruce Reinhart
attorneys.role: Former assistant US attorney, switched sides to represent Epstein employees Sarah Kellen, Nadia Marcinkova, and pilots on Jan 2, 2008

epstein_legal_team_details.note: Reinhart later became US Magistrate who signed Mar-a-Lago search warrant

details.name: Sarah Kellen
details.role: Epstein's scheduler, named co-conspirator in NPA

details.name: Nadia Marcinkova
details.role: Described as Epstein's 'sex slave' in court documents, named co-conspirator

details.name: Lesley Groff
details.role: Executive assistant, named co-conspirator - already in KB

key_figures.name: Doug Band
key_figures.role: Clinton Foundation, Teneo founder, described as 'surrogate son' to Bill Clinton

key_figures.name: Ira Magaziner
key_figures.role: Clinton Foundation architect, helped Hillary 'torpedo her own health care plan'

key_figures.name: Huma Abedin
key_figures.role: Put on Teneo payroll, 'surrogate daughter' to Hillary

teneo_details.description: Corporate consulting, public relations and merchant banking firm
teneo_details.scandal: Clinton Foundation distanced itself after MF Global collapse (Jon Corzine)

bruce_reinhart_switching_sides.finding: Former assistant US attorney who switched from prosecution to defense
bruce_reinhart_switching_sides.later_role: Now a US Magistrate in Palm Beach district
bruce_reinhart_switching_sides.allegations: Accused of leveraging inside information to curry favor with Epstein (he denies)

new_entities_discovered.name: Jean-Luc Brunel
new_entities_discovered.role: French modeling agent, MC2 Model Management. 'Very much involved in trafficking the girls'. Hid at Epstein mansion to evade deposition. Found dead in prison February 2022.

new_entities_discovered.name: Sarah Kellen
new_entities_discovered.role: Epstein's scheduler, named co-conspirator in NPA. Represented by Bruce Reinhart. 60 documents in archive.

new_entities_discovered.name: Nadia Marcinkova
new_entities_discovered.role: Described as Epstein's 'sex slave', named co-conspirator in NPA. Later became pilot using name 'Nadia Marcinko'. 42 documents in archive.

new_entities_discovered.name: Adriana Ross
new_entities_discovered.role: Epstein associate, named co-conspirator in Non Prosecution Agreement.

new_entities_discovered.name: Bruce Reinhart
new_entities_discovered.role: Former assistant US attorney Palm Beach. Switched sides Jan 2008 to represent Epstein employees. Later became US Magistrate who signed Mar-a-Lago search warrant.

new_entities_discovered.name: Jay Lefkowitz
new_entities_discovered.role: Kirkland & Ellis partner, Bush domestic policy adviser, North Korea envoy. Part of Epstein defense team.

new_entities_discovered.name: Doug Band
new_entities_discovered.role: Clinton Foundation, Teneo founder, 'bag carrier' and 'surrogate son' to Bill Clinton. Teneo charged up to $250K/month.

new_entities_discovered.name: Ira Magaziner
new_entities_discovered.role: Clinton Foundation architect. Helped Hillary on health care plan. Dispatched teams to fly around world for climate proposals.

new_entities_discovered.name: Jon Corzine
new_entities_discovered.role: Former NJ Governor, MF Global CEO. MF Global collapse led to Clinton Foundation distancing from Teneo.

new_entities_discovered.name: Paul Cassell
new_entities_discovered.role: Victims' attorney who filed Crime Victims Rights Act complaint against Reinhart.

new_entities_discovered.name: MC2 Model Management
new_entities_discovered.role: Modeling agency associated with Jean-Luc Brunel. Alleged to be pipeline for trafficking victims.

new_entities_discovered.name: Teneo
new_entities_discovered.role: Consulting firm founded by Doug Band. Blend of corporate consulting, PR, merchant banking. Clinton Foundation connections.

new_entities_discovered.name: Kirkland & Ellis
new_entities_discovered.role: Prestigious law firm. Both Alex Acosta and Jay Lefkowitz worked there. Provided Epstein defense team.

key_quotes.quote: Brunel's deposition is set and then he finagles out of it, too... he was hiding out in the mansion of Epstein while he's claiming he's unavailable for deposition
Nadia Marcinkova, described by some victims as Epstein's sex slave
The most egregious seat of sleaze was a firm founded by Doug Band called Teneo, a smarmy blend of corporate consulting, public relations and merchant banking

timeline_events.event: Bruce Reinhart switches from federal prosecutor to representing Epstein employees
Non Prosecution Agreement grants immunity to Kellen, Marcinkova, Groff, Ross
Doug Band founds Teneo, recruiting from Clinton Foundation donors
MF Global collapse leads Clinton Foundation to distance from Teneo
Jean-Luc Brunel found dead in prison cell in France
